response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This exceptional item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it has the potential to significantly impact your endeavors. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you at a special offer price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true value and offers you a unique chance to secure such a valuable asset at a highly favorable rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
